---
title: Lordicon Quarto Extension
format:
  html: default
---

This extension allows you to use lordicon icons in your Quarto HTML documents. It provides an `{{{< li >}}}` shortcode:

``` markdown
{{{< li src >}}}
```

For example:

| Shortcode               | Icon                  |
|-------------------------|-----------------------|
| `{{{< fa lupuorrc >}}}` | {{{< fa lupuorrc >}}} |
